ygData.subject: RE: Hate List + hand-to-hand + Brass + fun with slaves  + where to sho p  next
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She is a vendor.  You must have killed too many dervs, which she does not like hehe. Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr Erisi, Level 14
ygData.messageBody:
> By the way,
>
> Who the hell is this Murissa Sandwhisperer person? I was
> jaunting back to
> Freeport after killing some crocs the other day and assumed
> she was a vendor
> (like in E. Commons, where they are consistently not in the
> inns but rather
> in front of them or on top of them....still haven't figured
> that out yet)

She is a vendor. You must have killed too many dervs, which she does not
like hehe.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 14 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
